references.reason: This paper introduces Concept Bottleneck Models (CBMs), which are the foundation upon which the current paper's Relational CBMs are built.
This paper introduces Deep Concept Reasoners (DCRs), a key component used in the proposed Relational CBMs to enhance interpretability.
This paper introduces Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), a crucial component that is integrated into the relational CBMs architecture.
This paper introduces techniques for differentiable proving that are relevant to the relational reasoning aspects of the proposed model.
This paper introduces DeepProbLog, which is related to the neural-symbolic approach used in the proposed Relational CBMs
